nodes.text: Team Ord Mantell was a limmie team that played for the planet of Ord Mantell in the Galactic Cup of Limmie. In 22 BBY, during the Separatist Crisis, the planet of Kothlis's team defeated them with a single point in the Cup's opening round.

Team Ord Mantell was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 47, that was published in-universe on the fourteenth day of the third month in 22 BBY. The article that referenced the team, titled "Coruscant Eliminated in Galactic Cup Opening Round," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
